title: CampaignSpec
description: CampaignSpec is a description of a campaign.

name.description: The name of the campaign, which is unique among all campaigns in the namespace. A campaign's name is case-preserving.

changesets.description: A list of changesets that this campaign ensures the existence of.

Changeset.description: A changeset is a list of commits to a repository at a particular commit (along with other metadata, such as a title and description, used to create a code review on a code host).
